articles.title: Russia Sends North Korea's Nukes Signal to US Allies
articles.description: Russia has backed North Korea's nuclear program and warned Washington against teaming up with regional Asian allies, following military drills between the U.S., Japan, and South Korea.

articles.title: Unsold Homes Surge Nationwide As Housing Market Stalls
articles.description: Thousands of unsold homes are piling up in the U.S. housing market as Americans buy fewer homes amid climbing prices, high mortgage rates, and economic uncertainty.

articles.title: Texas Floods Kill at Least 82 People, with Dozens Still Missing and More Rains Forecast
articles.description: Search and rescue missions continue in central Texas, where catastrophic flooding has resulted in at least 82 deaths, with dozens still missing.
